text: Mohamad Shoffi bin Jikan (born 13 November 1970) is a Malaysian comedy actor and director. ==Personal life== On 13 May, Sofi was ordered to defend himself by Mahkamah Petaling Jaya on charges of using marijuanna. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" !
